## AlRoute.findChild() method

Retrieves a nested child route by matching bookmarks, captions, IDs, or numerical indices.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findChild(idPath: string | string[]): AlRoute | null;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  idPath | <code>string &#124; string[]</code> |  |
